contents: I make love with a focus and intensity that most people reserve for sleep.
If you want to be happy, do not dwell in the past, do not worry about the future, focus on living fully in the present.
Very occasionally, if you pay really close attention, life doesn't suck.
What you stay focused on will grow.
Instead of focusing on how much you can accomplish, focus on how much you can absolutely love what you’re doing.

He said focus. The word focus. I hear angels singing. Everything goes dark except for a light that beams down on Sean. It is a God-given sign- like when people see the Virgin Mary in their grilled cheese, except this isn't religious and I'm actually not a big fan of dairy. I stare at the back of his head. His HEAD. Something I see every day but never really see because it's been there forever. Since the first day of third grade.I crumple up my web. I don't need it. Praise be, the Focus Gods have spoken.I am going to write about Sean Griswold's Head.
Everyone's time is limited. What matters most is to focus on what matters most.
Never focus on achieving your goals, focus on achieving the behaviors and beliefs that will help you achieve your goals
It is difficult to live in and enjoy the moment when you are thinking about the past or worrying about the future.
Don't interpret anything too much. This is time waster number 1.
Ah yes, the head is full of books. The hard part is to force them down through the bloodstream and out through the fingers.
Inspiration is the windfall from hard work and focus. Muses are too unreliable to keep on the payroll.
Where your attention lies is where your life thrives. Shift your focus if you're unsatisfied.
You only have to do a very few things right in your life so long as you don't do too many things wrong.
A lot of people don’t do well simply because they major in minor things.
